Name: CANDLE
Descriptions: A WAX CANDLE. IT'S NOT LIT

Name: PLATE
Descriptions: A SILVER PLATE. IT HAS SOME BEANS ON IT

Name: DOLL
Descriptions: A CHILD'S TOY. IT'S MISSING SOMETHING...
THE DOLL IS DRESSED WITH A LOVELY BOW!

Name: DOLL BOW
Descriptions: A RED RIBBON, LIKE WOULD BE WORN ON A CHILD'S TOY

Name: TOWEL
Descriptions: YOU'RE WEARING THE TOWEL AROUND YOUR FACE

Name: GHOST
Descriptions: THE GHOST OF AN ADULT FORM. IT LOOKS HUNGRY

Name: DEMON
Descriptions: A SAVAGE EVIL DEMON! IT'S ATTACKING YOU!

Name: TOILET
Descriptions: WHAT DO YOU EXPECT ME TO SAY?

Name: FIREPLACE
Descriptions: A STONE FIREPLACE. IT'S NOT LIT

Name: SINK
Descriptions: A PORCELAIN SINK, LOOKS LIKE IT MIGHT WORK
A STREAM OF WATER STREAMS FROM ITS TAP

Name: SMALL GHOST
Descriptions: IT'S SMALL ENOUGH TO BE A CHILD... IT LOOKS SAD

Name: GLASS
Descriptions: THE WATER IS CLEAR AND SEEMS TO GLOW A LITTLE

Name: DRAINPIPE
Descriptions: IT'S PARTWAY UP THE HOUSE. COULD BE A WAY UP!
A ROPE TIED TO IT PROVIDES A WAY UP

Name: BORED GHOST
Descriptions: IT SEEMS IT COULD USE SOME ENTERTAINMENT
